alert.note: Alert for Cerro Gordo; Franklin; Hancock; Winnebago; Worth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 4:17PM CDT until March 31 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Worth County in north central Iowa... Northwestern Franklin County in north central Iowa... Eastern Hancock County in north central Iowa... Cerro Gordo County in north central Iowa... Southeastern Winnebago County in north central Iowa... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 416 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Miller, or near Garner, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Mason City, Forest City, Garner, Northwood, Lake Mills, Nora Springs, Manly, Sheffield, Rockwell, Emmons, Clear Lake, Eagle Lake, Mason City Municipal Airport, Rice Lake, Ventura, Klemme, Thornton, Plymouth, Fertile and Leland. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 171 and 218. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Iowa.

area.areaDesc: Cerro Gordo; Franklin; Hancock; Winnebago; Worth
